horrifying new AI app swaps women into porn videos with a clickKaren HaoWe reviewed three at-home covid tests. The results were mixed.Antonio RegaladoThe worst technology of 2021Antonio RegaladoThe metaverse has a groping problem alreadyTanya BasuMagazineThe Water issue\nAround the world, the effects of climate change are being written in water. Droughts, flooding, and sea level rise are changing our lives. In this issue, we explore what our water future holds \xe2\x80\x94 and some of the ways that people are finding to navigate it.\nMore issues >Our TeamSiobhan RobertsThis puzzle challenge brings joy to the world of codeDavid RotmanAn uber-optimistic view of the futureWill Douglas Heaven2021 was the year of monster AI modelsAntonio RegaladoThe worst technology of 2021More about us >EventsMore eventsTopicsArtificial intelligenceBiotechnologyBlockchainClimate changeComputingElection 2020Humans and technologyPandemic technology projectSilicon valleySmart citiesSpaceTech policyFollowtwitterlink opens in a new windowfacebooklink opens in a new windowinstagramlink opens in a new windowrsslink opens in a new windowlinkedinlink opens in a new window\n  @media (max-width: 630px) {\n    #footerBg img, #footerBg source {\n      object-position: center bottom;\n    } \n  }\n  @media (min-width:630px) and (max-width:960px) {\n    #footerBg img, #footerBg source {\n      object-position: center bottom;\n    } \n  }\n  @media (min-width:960px) and (max-width:1312px) {\n    #footerBg img, #footerBg source {\n      object-position: center bottom;\n    } \n  }\n  @media (min-width:1312px) {\n    #footerBg img, #footerBg source {\n      object-position: center bottom;\n    } \n  }\nMIT Technology ReviewOur mission is to bring about better-informed and more conscious decisions about technology through authoritative, influential, and trustworthy journalism.Subscribe to support our journalism.AboutAbout usCareersCustom contentAdvertise with usInternational EditionsRepublishingMIT NewsHelpHelp & FAQMy subscriptionEditorial guidelinesPrivacy policyCookie statementTerms of ServiceContact ustwitterlink opens in a new windowfacebooklink opens in a new windowinstagramlink opens in a new windowrsslink opens in a new windowlinkedinlink opens in a new windowCover Art by Peter Crowther Associates\xc2\xa9 2022 MIT Technology ReviewBack to top\n\n\n'
